title: ‘It Strengthened Our Collaboration’: Kopecky, Vollering Vow No Bad Vibes from 2023 in Strade Bianche Redux
content:
Questions over Vollering's future and tension-riddled final last spring hang over SD Worx-Protime's Strade Bianche favorites.

Read the full article at ‘It Strengthened Our Collaboration’: Kopecky, Vollering Vow No Bad Vibes from 2023 in Strade Bianche Redux on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
